name: Megahorn
desc: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into enemies in front of itself with no letup, dealing huge damage to them.

name: U turn
desc: After attacking surrounding enemies, the user moves back to dodge enemies' counterattacks.

name: Leech Life
desc: The user drains the blood of enemies directly in front of itself, damaging them. Part of the damage dealt is absorbed to restore the user's HP.

name: Lunge
desc: The user lunges toward enemies in front of itself, damaging them.

name: String Shot
desc: The user spews a sticky thread in three directions, creating nets that will damage enemies and often lower their movement speed.

name: Silver Wind
desc: Scales carried by the wind swirl around the user, damaging enemies hit by them. Some or all of the user's stats sometimes rise at random.

name: Rage Powder
desc: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder on itself, causing surrounding enemies to target it.

name: Pin Missile
desc: The user shoots three sharp spikes in front of itself, damaging enemies hit by them.

name: Crunch
desc: The user takes aim and then bites on to enemies a short distance in front of itself, damaging them.

name: Sucker Punch
desc: The user briefly disappears and moves a short distance. It then charges toward enemies, damaging them.

name: Night Slash
desc: The user dashes forward, slashing surrounding enemies and damaging them. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Taunt
desc: The user taunts surrounding enemies, forcing them to target it.

name: Nasty Plot
desc: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts, raising the amount of damage it deals for a while.

name: Flatter
desc: The user flatters enemies in front of itself, which confuses them but raises the amount of damage they deal and reduces the amount of damage they take.

name: Draco Meteor
desc: The user summons several meteors down around itself, damaging enemies hit by them. Sometimes reduces the amount of damage the user deals.

name: Dragon Claw
desc: The user gathers its strength, then charges forward while spinning, damaging enemies with its sharp claws.

name: Dragon Rush
desc: The user flies into enemies a short distance from itself with great intensity, damaging them.

name: Twister
desc: The user whips up several tornadoes and sends them out in front of itself, damaging enemies hit by them.

name: Outrage
desc: The user rampages about, attacking and damaging any enemies in its path. Sometimes confuses the user.

name: Dragon Dance
desc: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that raises the amount of damage it deals and its movement speed for a while.

name: Dragon Pulse
desc: The user sends a shock wave flying from its mouth, damaging enemies hit by it.

name: Thunder
desc: The user strikes the area in front of itself with a lightning bolt. Deals damage to nearby enemies. Sometimes paralyzes enemies.

name: Thunder Punch
desc: The user charges its fist with electricity and unleashes a shocking punch on enemies directly in front of itself, sometimes paralyzing them.

name: Thunder Shock
desc: After storing up electricity, the user fires it toward enemies in front of itself, dealing damage to them. Sometimes paralyzes enemies.

name: Volt Tackle
desc: After electrifying itself and charging toward enemies, the user jumps and discharges electricity, damaging enemies hit by it and sometimes paralyzing them.

name: Spark
desc: The user charges its body with electricity and charges toward enemies in front of itself. Sometimes paralyzes enemies.

name: Thunderbolt
desc: The user discharges tremendous electricity all around itself. Deals damage to enemies around the user. Sometimes paralyzes enemies.

name: Electric Terrain
desc: The user gathers electrical power beneath itself, raising the damage it deals for a while.

name: Electroweb
desc: The user spreads an electric net out directly in front of itself, lowering the movement speed of enemies hit by it for a while.

name: Charge
desc: The user stores up electricity, raising the damage it deals and making it resistant to negative effects for a while.

name: Dazzling Gleam
desc: The user moves about as it emits a powerful flash that damages enemies hit by it.

name: Play Rough
desc: The user plays rough with enemies in front of itself, damaging them. Sometimes lowers the damage enemies deal.

name: Charm
desc: The user makes surrounding enemies less wary with its cute behavior, often reducing the amount of damage they deal.

name: Draining Kiss
desc: The user kisses enemies directly in front of itself and damages them. Part of the damage dealt restores the user's HP.

name: Sweet Kiss
desc: The user kisses enemies directly in front of itself with a sweet, angelic kiss that often confuses them.

name: High Jump Kick
desc: After charging toward enemies in front of itself, the user jumps up and deals damage with a knee kick. The user also takes recoil damage.

name: Cross Chop
desc: The user jumps toward enemies in front of itself and smacks them with a two handed chop, damaging them. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Close Combat
desc: The user gets right up on enemies in front of itself and smacks them with a single blow, damaging them. Sometimes raises the amount of damage the user takes.

name: Drain Punch
desc: The user fires a punch at enemies directly in front of itself, damaging them. It also absorbs power with its fist, restoring its own HP.

name: Rolling Kick
desc: The user kicks as it spins in place, dealing damage to surrounding enemies.

name: Submission
desc: The user spins toward enemies in front of itself, smashing into them. Deals damage to enemies hit by the user as it whirls around.

name: Dynamic Punch
desc: The user punches enemies directly in front of itself with its full, concentrated power. Sometimes confuses enemies.

name: Power Up Punch
desc: The user delivers a punch with its hard fist to enemies directly in front of itself, damaging them. Often raises the amount of damage the user deals.

name: Rock Smash
desc: The user unleashes its fury, damaging enemies in a broad area nearby and destroying surrounding trees and rocks.

name: Bulk Up
desc: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising the damage it deals for a while. This also reduces the damage the user takes.

name: Fire Punch
desc: The user imbues its fist with the power of flames, and strikes enemies directly in front of it with a burning punch. Deals damage and sometimes burns enemies.

name: Fire Blast
desc: The user sprays an all consuming fire on the ground, damaging enemies hit by it and sometimes burning them.

name: Lava Plume
desc: The user spouts scarlet flames all around itself. Deals damage to enemies around it. Sometimes burns enemies.

name: Heat Wave
desc: The user exhales hot breath in front of itself, damaging enemies hit by it and sometimes burning them.

name: Ember
desc: The user fires sparks in front of itself that split and run in three directions when they hit the ground. Deals damage to enemies they hit. Sometimes burns enemies.

name: Fire Spin
desc: The user creates flames all around itself and fires them off in a spiral. Deals damage to enemies they hit. Sometimes burns enemies.

name: Flamethrower
desc: The user continuously breathes out long flames for a while. Deals damage to enemies as long as they remain in the flames. Sometimes burns enemies.

name: Flame Wheel
desc: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges forward, damaging enemies it hits and sometimes burning them.

name: Flame Charge
desc: The user stores up the power of flames, raising the damage it deals for a while.

name: Flare Blitz
desc: The user creates a path of flames in front of itself and charges forward along it. Deals damage to enemies. Sometimes burns enemies.

name: Will O Wisp
desc: The user drapes itself with sinister flames and attacks enemies directly in front of it. Often burns enemies.

name: Drill Peck
desc: The user attacks enemies directly in front of itself with its sharp beak, damaging them.

name: Fly
desc: The user flies toward enemies far in front of itself, then swoops down to deal damage to them.

name: Bounce
desc: The user bounces forward high into the air twice, damaging enemies it hits.

name: Sky Attack
desc: After flying up and bracing itself, the user charges at enemies directly in front of itself, damaging them. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Aerial Ace
desc: The user quickly slashes in front of itself twice, dealing damage.

name: Hurricane
desc: The user whips up an intense wind around itself, damaging surrounding enemies and sometimes confusing them.

name: Gust
desc: The user sends an intense gust of wind out in front of itself that whirls around and damages enemies hit by it.

name: Tailwind
desc: The user creates an intense swirling wind that raises its movement speed for a while.

name: Roost
desc: The user briefly rests its body, restoring a bit of its HP.

name: Lick
desc: The user licks enemies all around itself with its long tongue, damaging them. Sometimes paralyzes enemies.

name: Astonish
desc: The user tries to startle enemies directly in front of itself, damaging those taken by surprise.

name: Shadow Ball
desc: The user hurls a shadowy blob in front of itself, damaging enemies hit by it. Sometimes raises the amount of damage they take.

name: Confuse Ray
desc: The user exposes surrounding enemies to a sinister ray, often confusing them.

name: Vine Whip
desc: The user strikes enemies in front of itself with whiplike vines. Deals damage to enemies hit by them.

name: Solar Beam
desc: The user gathers light and unleashes it in front of itself, dealing damage to enemies hit by it.

name: Bullet Seed
desc: The user sends several seeds flying out in front of itself simultaneously, damaging enemies hit by them.

name: Mega Drain
desc: The user attacks enemies in front of itself, dealing damage to them. Some of the damage dealt is absorbed by the user, restoring its HP.

name: Petal Dance
desc: The user spins in place, scattering petals that deal damage to enemies around it.

name: Razor Leaf
desc: The user launches sharp edged leaves to slash at enemies, damaging them. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Leech Seed
desc: The user plants a seed on the ground in front of itself. Enemies in range are gradually damaged. Part of the damage dealt is absorbed to restore the user's HP.

name: Stun Spore
desc: The user scatters numbing powder directly in front of itself. Often paralyzes enemies hit by it.

name: Synthesis
desc: The user absorbs light, raising the damage it deals for a while.

name: Spore
desc: The user scatters sleep inducing spores directly in front of itself, often making enemies fall asleep.

name: Earthquake
desc: The user causes an earthquake that damages surrounding enemies.

name: Dig
desc: The user digs a tunnel to travel beneath the feet of enemies in front of itself, then pops out from beneath them to damage them.

name: Mud Bomb
desc: The user throws a lump of mud in front of itself that splits open when it hits the ground, damaging surrounding enemies and sometimes raising the amount of damage they take.

name: Bonemerang
desc: The user throws a boomerang made of bone, damaging enemies hit by it.

name: Mud Slap
desc: The user hurls mud in three directions, dealing damage to enemies hit by it. Sometimes reduces their movement speed.

name: Shore Up
desc: The user gathers sand from beneath itself, restoring a bit of its HP.

name: Spikes
desc: The user scatters spikes in front of itself, damaging enemies that step on them.

name: Ice Punch
desc: The user chills its fist and unleashes a freezing punch on enemies directly in front of it. Sometimes freezes enemies.

name: Icicle Crash
desc: The user drops frigid icicles in front of itself. Deals damage to enemies hit by them and sometimes freezes them.

name: Ice Beam
desc: The user fires an icy cold beam at enemies in front of itself. Deals damage to enemies and sometimes freezes them.

name: Icy Wind
desc: The user sends a freezing gust of chilled air at enemies in front of itself, damaging them. Sometimes lowers enemies' movement speed.

name: Blizzard
desc: The user moves about while creating a blizzard centered on itself. Deals damage to enemies around the user and sometimes freezes them.

name: Aurora Veil
desc: The user cloaks itself in a veil of light, reducing the amount of damage it takes for a while.

name: Mega Punch
desc: After approaching enemies in front of itself, the user slugs enemies directly in front of itself with a muscle packed punch, damaging them.

name: Self Destruct
desc: The user approaches enemies and causes an explosion, damaging all surrounding enemies. The tradeoff is that the user takes enough damage to knock itself out.

name: Hyper Beam
desc: The user stores up power and then fires a tremendous beam at enemies. Deals severe damage to enemies it hits.

name: Scratch
desc: The user rakes its hard, pointed claws over enemies directly in front of itself, damaging them.

name: Slam
desc: The user slams nearby enemies with a long tail, vines, or the like, damaging all of them.

name: Take Down
desc: The user slams into enemies in front of itself with a reckless, full body charge, damaging all enemies hit by it. The user also takes recoil damage.

name: Stomp
desc: The user stomps on enemies in front of itself with a big foot, damaging them.

name: Giga Impact
desc: The user focuses every bit of its power and charges toward enemies in front of itself, dealing huge damage to them.

name: Tackle
desc: The user smashes into enemies in front of itself with all its might, damaging them.

name: Fury Swipes
desc: The user repeatedly swipes at enemies directly in front of itself, damaging them.

name: Extreme Speed
desc: The user charges into enemies in front of itself with blinding speed, damaging them.

name: Flail
desc: The user flails about, damaging enemies it hits.

name: Tri Attack
desc: The user's body is imbued with three powers as it attacks enemies in front of itself, damaging them. Sometimes burns, paralyzes, or freezes enemies.

name: Splash
desc: The user splashes in place.

name: Harden
desc: The user stiffens its body, lowering the damage it takes for a while.

name: Swords Dance
desc: With a frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit, the user raises the amount of damage it deals for a while.

name: Growl
desc: The user growls in an endearing way, making surrounding enemies less wary and often reducing the amount of damage they deal.

name: Leer
desc: The user glares at nearby enemies to intimidate them, often raising the amount of damage they take.

name: Whirlwind
desc: The user whips up a strong wind around itself, blowing away enemies hit by it.

name: Recover
desc: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its HP.

name: Roar
desc: The user roars intensely, blowing away surrounding enemies.

name: Soft Boiled
desc: The user restores its HP with the power of eggs.

name: Supersonic
desc: The user generates odd sound waves from its body, often confusing surrounding enemies.

name: Sing
desc: The user sings to enemies around itself with its calming voice, often putting them to sleep.

name: Transform
desc: When Ditto transforms into another Pokemon, this changes into a move that Pokemon can learn.

name: Substitute
desc: The user puts out a substitute for itself that enemies are forced to attack.

name: Belly Drum
desc: The user uses its own HP to raise all of its stats for a while.

name: Work Up
desc: The user is roused, raising the amount of damage it deals and reducing the amount of damage it takes for a while.

name: Flash
desc: The user suddenly flashes a bright light at surrounding enemies, often lowering their movement speed.

name: Focus Energy
desc: The user takes a deep breath and focuses, raising the amount of damage it deals for a while.

name: Egg Bomb
desc: The user scatters eggs around itself, damaging enemies hit by them.

name: Follow Me
desc: The user grabs the attention of surrounding enemies, forcing them to target it.

name: Explosion
desc: The user causes a tremendous explosion, dealing huge damage to surrounding enemies. The trade off is that the user takes enough damage to knock itself out.

name: Comet Punch
desc: The user unleashes a flurry of punches on enemies directly in front of itself, damaging them.

name: Smog
desc: The user spews poison around itself, damaging enemies. Sometimes poisons enemies.

name: Sludge Bomb
desc: The user shoots out a glob of sludge that splits open when it hits the ground, damaging surrounding enemies. Sometimes poisons enemies.

name: Poison Sting
desc: The user fires a poisonous stinger at enemies in front of itself. Sometimes poisons enemies hit by it.

name: Poison Powder
desc: The user scatters poison powder in front of itself, often poisoning enemies hit by it.

name: Toxic
desc: The user sprays a powerful poison around itself, often poisoning enemies hit by it.

name: Acid Armor
desc: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, reducing the damage it takes for a while.

name: Venom Drench
desc: The user spews poison in front of itself, sometimes raising the amount of damage enemies take.

name: Zen Headbutt
desc: The user focuses its willpower to its head, then smashes it into enemies directly in front of itself, dealing damage to enemies hit by it.

name: Psycho Cut
desc: After moving forward, the user deals damage to enemies with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Psystrike
desc: The user creates a large orb of light in front of itself. The orb then splits into many smaller ones that fly out in all directions, dealing damage to surrounding enemies.

name: Psychic
desc: The user creates a large, mysterious light and fires it out, dealing damage to enemies hit by it. Sometimes raises the amount of damage they take.

name: Psybeam
desc: The user sends peculiar rays of light out in three directions, damaging enemies hit by them. Sometimes confuses enemies.

name: Barrier
desc: The user throws up a wall around itself, lowering the amount of damage it takes for a while.

name: Amnesia
desc: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns, raising the amount of damage it deals and making it more resistant to negative effects.

name: Light Screen
desc: The user creates a wall of light, making it harder for it to be affected by negative effects for a while.

name: Hypnosis
desc: The user employs hypnotic suggestion, often making enemies in front of itself fall asleep.

name: Agility
desc: The user relaxes and lightens its body, raising its movement speed for a while.

name: Teleport
desc: The user utilizes its psychic powers to teleport. (Meta? for positioning?)

name: Meditate
desc: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body, raising the amount of damage it deals for a while.

name: Rest
desc: The user rests in place, greatly restoring its HP.

name: Rock Throw
desc: The user picks up two rocks and hurls them in front of itself, damaging enemies hit by them.

name: Rock Tomb
desc: The user drops boulders directly in front of itself, damaging enemies hit by them and sometimes lowering their movement speed.

name: Stealth Rock
desc: The user creates pillars of stone from the ground, damaging enemies hit by them.

name: Sandstorm
desc: The user creates a sandstorm around itself, damaging enemies hit by it.

name: Rollout
desc: The user spins around, damaging surrounding enemies it smashes into.

name: Rock Polish
desc: The user polishes its body to reduce drag, raising its movement speed for a while.

name: Rock Blast
desc: The user hurls hard rocks in front of itself, damaging enemies hit by them.

name: Metal Claw
desc: The user rakes enemies in front of itself with its steel claws, dealing damage. Sometimes raises the amount of damage the user deals.

name: Flash Cannon
desc: The user focuses all of its light energy into a single point and fires a beam in front of itself, sometimes raising the amount of damage enemies take.

name: Steel Wing
desc: The user charges at enemies in front of itself and smacks them with its hard wings, dealing damage. Sometimes reduces the amount of damage the user takes.

name: Iron Tail
desc: The user swings its steel hard tail, damaging surrounding enemies and sometimes raising the amount of damage they take.

name: Metal Sound
desc: Enemies near the user are forced to listen to a horrible sound like metal scraping, often raising the amount of damage they take.

name: Iron Defense
desc: The user hardens its skin until it's like iron, lowering the damage it takes for a while.

name: Waterfall
desc: The user approaches enemies in front of itself and creates a pillar of water beneath them. This deals damage to enemies it hits.

name: Hydro Pump
desc: The user shoots four pillars of water up from the ground and sends them out in front of itself. Deals damage to enemies hit by them.

name: Aqua Jet
desc: The user charges at enemies in front of itself with tremendous speed, dealing damage to them.

name: Surf
desc: The user creates a wide wave and charges forward on it. Deals damage to enemies caught in the wave.

name: Whirlpool
desc: The user creates a whirlpool around itself. Deals damage to enemies around the user.

name: Bubble
desc: The user fires bubbles in three directions. Deals damage to enemies hit by the bubbles and sometimes lowers their movement speed.

name: Withdraw
desc: The user withdraws into its hard shell, reducing the amount of damage it takes for a while.

name: Aqua Ring
desc: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water, restoring some of its HP.
